name: The North Face Explore City Tunic - Women's
description:
Get out to discover new places in this ultra-light, travel-ready top. Made from a soft recycled polyester, it dries in a flash and packs into its own pocket for easy transport.Soft, woven polyester ripstop with FlashDry-XD™ to improve wicking and reducing dry time.Side seam stash pocket doubles as a stuff sack for your tunic.Relaxed fit offers the ultimate in casual comfort.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}
